DOC.brief_summary: Research show high percentage college student meet recommended national guideline physical activity fruit/vegetable intake . The purpose study pilot test short-term efficacy one-on-one , brief motivational intervention ( BMI ) design increase physical activity fruit/vegetable intake . It hypothesize participant BMI condition would report great physical activity fruit/vegetable intake follow-up education-only control condition .
DOC.brief_title: Brief Motivational Intervention Increase Physical Activity Fruit/Vegetable Intake
DOC.criteria: Two few day 30+ minute moderate physical activity per week Zero day 20+ minute vigorous physical activity per week Three day 30+ minute moderate physical activity per week One day 20+ minute vigorous physical activity per week
